page.title: 13RECREATION FACILITIES
page.content: {THE MINERS WELFARE PARK}contains a leisure centre,skating rink,golf course, bowls ,cricket ground and a play park. {A PASSPORT TO LEISURE }is purchased for reductions for adults on most facilities.For children entry for swimming,skating,golf and tennis is free using a passport.A passport to leisure is a plastic card containing information and a photograph of yourself.The leisure centre contains 2 swimming pools and 4 squash courts. Bowls is not open to the public but is a private club.There are 4 tennis courts which are open to any age group as is the skating rink but your own equipment is needed .The golf course is open to any one aged 13 and over and equipment can be hired.{ { {
